statements: SELECT * FROM projects;
SELECT project_name, client_name FROM projects WHERE deadline >= '2022-12-31';
SELECT project_name, client_name FROM projects WHERE client_name = 'ABC Corp';
SELECT * FROM projects WHERE deadline < '2022-06-30' ORDER BY project_name DESC;
SELECT project_name, deadline FROM projects WHERE client_name IS NULL ORDER BY deadline ASC;
SELECT project_id, project_name, deadline, client_name FROM projects WHERE project_id = '123456' AND deadline >= '2023-01-01';
SELECT * FROM projects WHERE client_name = 'John Doe' ORDER BY deadline DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_projects FROM projects;
SELECT project_name AS name, project_id FROM projects WHERE project_id IN ('789012', '345678', '901234');
SELECT DISTINCT client_name, COUNT(*) AS total_projects FROM projects GROUP BY client_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT * FROM projects;
SELECT project_name, deadline FROM projects WHERE p_id = 1;
SELECT project_name, client_id FROM projects ORDER BY project_name DESC;
SELECT client_name, client_email FROM clients WHERE client_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM projects WHERE deadline > '2022-01-01';
SELECT p_id, project_name, deadline, client_id FROM projects WHERE client_id = 1 ORDER BY deadline DESC;
SELECT project_name, client_id FROM projects WHERE deadline > '2022-01-01' AND client_id IN (1, 2) ORDER BY project_name ASC;
SELECT client_name, client_email FROM clients WHERE client_id = 1;
SELECT p_id, project_name, client_name, client_email FROM projects JOIN clients ON projects.client_id = clients.client_id;
SELECT * FROM projects WHERE deadline < '2023-01-01' ORDER BY deadline ASC, project_name DESC;
SELECT project_name, client_id, deadline FROM work_projects WHERE project_id = 1;
SELECT client_name, phone_number FROM clients WHERE email = 'example@example.com';
SELECT * FROM work_deadlines WHERE deadline_date > '2022-12-31';
SELECT project_name, client_id FROM work_projects ORDER BY project_name DESC;
SELECT project_name, client_id FROM work_projects WHERE client_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM work_projects WHERE deadline IS NOT NULL ORDER BY project_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT project_name, client_name, email FROM work_projects JOIN clients ON work_projects.client_id = clients.client_id WHERE client_id = 3;
SELECT project_name, deadline_date FROM work_projects JOIN work_deadlines ON work_projects.project_id = work_deadlines.project_id WHERE deadline_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT project_name, phone_number FROM work_projects JOIN clients ON work_projects.client_id = clients.client_id WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL ORDER BY project_id;

SELECT project_name, client_name, deadline_date FROM work_projects JOIN clients ON work_projects.client_id = clients.client_id JOIN work_deadlines ON work_projects.project_id = work_deadlines.project_id WHERE deadline_date < '2023-01-01';
SELECT project_id, project_name, client_id, start_date, deadline FROM projects;
SELECT client_name, contact_name, contact_email FROM clients;
SELECT project_id, deadline_date, status FROM deadlines;
SELECT project_name, project_description, project_status FROM work_projects;
SELECT * FROM projects WHERE deadline IS NOT NULL;
SELECT project_name, client_id, start_date FROM projects ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT client_name, contact_name, contact_email FROM clients WHERE contact_name IS NOT NULL;
SELECT project_name, project_description, project_status FROM work_projects WHERE project_status = 'InProgress';
SELECT project_name, client_id, start_date, deadline FROM projects WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND deadline IS NOT NULL ORDER BY deadline ASC;
SELECT project_id, project_name, deadline_date, status FROM deadlines WHERE status = 'Pending';
SELECT * FROM work_projects;
SELECT project_name, deadline FROM work_projects WHERE project_id = 1;
SELECT client_name, contact_email FROM client_information WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT task_description, deadline FROM project_tasks ORDER BY deadline DESC;
SELECT assignee_id, assigned_date FROM task_assignments WHERE task_id = 5;
SELECT project_name, project_description FROM work_projects WHERE deadline > '2022-01-01';
SELECT project_name, deadline FROM work_projects WHERE project_name LIKE '%database%';
SELECT * FROM client_information WHERE country='USA' ORDER BY client_name ASC;
SELECT task_description, deadline FROM project_tasks WHERE deadline < '2022-06-01';

SELECT t1.project_id, t2.client_name, t3.task_description FROM work_projects t1 JOIN client_information t2 ON t1.project_id = t2.client_id JOIN project_tasks t3 ON t1.project_id = t3.project_id WHERE t3.deadline > '2022-08-01';
